EmailTemplate.name: GS Denmark Auto response
EmailTemplate.subject: We have received your request #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hej!
Tak for din henvendelse jeg er glad for at du har kontaktet SAS.
Mens du venter kan du finde masser af inspiration til din rejse her www.sas.dk
Best Regards SAS Direct Group Sales SAS Customer Service Mandag – Fredag 08.00 – 17.00 Phone: +45 3232 6920
Scandinavian Airlines System flysas.com, Facebook, Twitter, Youtube
